modName: Forgotten City and Wheels of Lull Compatibility Patch
summary: Just Fixing 2 small issues with compatibility. See pictures for details!
descriptionHtml:
So people on reddit asked me to upload this little patch I made, so here we go.

Obviously you need both:

Forgotten City
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70219/?

Wheels of Lull
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58672/?


Installation:
Just download with MO, install and check the little box to activate it.

Load Order:
Just make sure it loads after both Forgotten City and Wheels of Lull. Otherwise you'll crash on startup.
Other than that it shouldn't really matter where it in your load order.



See Pictures for details on what I did.


Credits:
Full Credit goes to the mod Authors of Wheels of Lull and The Forgotten City for their fantastic mods. I just did a little drag and drop in TESV Edit.
author: Chack321
